game.name: Voidloop
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Voidbound is a mining adventure where you explore random caves, fight dangerous enemies, and upgrade your abilities. Can you find your way back home to the void?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Voidbound is a mining adventure where you explore random caves, fight dangerous enemies, and upgrade your abilities. Can you find your way back home to the void?
